unnormalised: EdTech Heats Up: Exam Prep Apps Become the Must-Have Study Buddy!
normalised: E-d-T-e-c-h Heats Up: Exam Prep Apps Become the Must-Have Study Buddy!

unnormalised: Are you gearing up for those dreaded entrance exams? Don't sweat it! Exam prep apps are the new rage, making studying less of a chore and more, well, almost fun! From JEE prep to cracking the UPSC, these digital gurus are packed with mock tests, personalized learning paths, and even video lectures.
normalised: Are you gearing up for those dreaded entrance exams? Don't sweat it! Exam prep apps are the new rage, making studying less of a chore and more, well, almost fun! From J-E-E prep to cracking the U-P-S-C, these digital gurus are packed with mock tests, personalized learning paths, and even video lectures.

unnormalised: Think of it like this: instead of cramming with dusty textbooks, you're munching on hot samosas while acing practice questions. That's the power of EdTech, bhai!
normalised: Think of it like this: instead of cramming with dusty textbooks, you're munching on hot samosas while acing practice questions. That's the power of E-d-T-e-c-h, bhai!

unnormalised: Apps like "ExamMitra" and "VidyaSaathi" are boasting record downloads this Onam season. They even gamify the learning process - collect points, climb leaderboards, and unlock biryani recipes (okay, maybe not biryani, but definitely some cool rewards!). Plus, they're way cheaper than traditional coaching centers, costing only a few hundred Rs. a month.
normalised: Apps like "ExamMitra" and "VidyaSaathi" are boasting record downloads this Onam season. They even gamify the learning process - collect points, climb leaderboards, and unlock biryani recipes (okay, maybe not biryani, but definitely some cool rewards!). Plus, they're way cheaper than traditional coaching centers, costing only a few hundred rupees a month.

unnormalised: So, ditch the late-night chai-fueled study sessions and download an app. Your future IIT dreams (or maybe just passing that semester exam) will thank you for it. Exam prep apps: your shortcut to success!
normalised: So, ditch the late-night chai-fueled study sessions and download an app. Your future I-I-T dreams (or maybe just passing that semester exam) will thank you for it. Exam prep apps: your shortcut to success!
